page.title: 11NEWS ITEMS
page.content: {Sources:}Hinckley Times,Journal,Trader { {News Items:}Â£50 raised by performing Burbage Methodist Church group for LOROS.St. Catherine's Church hope to win Â£2000 and get a new choirboy. Houses to be built on school fields. Burbage man wins Â£103000 on the pools. Sharnford School has been vandalised. Sharnford win flower show-1st prize. {Sport:}Burbage Rugby Club won 7-6 when they played Atherstone. Sharnford beat University at cricket. {Letters:}Complaints about a javelin being thrown into a persons garden. OAP's don't like us say young people. {House costs:}Detatched........Â£34000 Semi-detached....Â£28000 Bungalow.........Â£32000 Terraced.........Â£18000
